name: Breakolf
description:
This was created during #leetgamejam and polished up to what you see today. The game is a mix between normal mini-golf and breakout, so there will be some block destroying to do!

It contains 18 holes just as a normal mini-golf course so share your score if you can finish them all!

Controls
Mouse to aim and shoot

Follow me on: Twitter

Play it online:  Online
Find more of my games: My Site

Have fun and stay awesome!

/ Elastiskalinjen
